name: just_a_developer
description: Just a Developer - 智能开发助手，自动整合 Git 提交记录并生成工作报告
author: SooKool

scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:node && npm run typecheck:web
scripts.patch:tailwind-oxide: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const cleanOptional=(pkgFile)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(pkgFile))return;const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(pkgFile,'utf8'));if(pkg.optionalDependencies){delete pkg.optionalDependencies;fs.writeFileSync(pkgFile,JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'\n');}};cleanOptional(path.join(__dirname,'node_modules/@tailwindcss/oxide/package.json'));cleanOptional(path.join(__dirname,'node_modules/lightningcss/package.json'));const npmCollectorPath=path.join(__dirname,'node_modules/app-builder-lib/out/node-module-collector/NpmNodeModulesCollector.js');if(fs.existsSync(npmCollectorPath)){const src=fs.readFileSync(npmCollectorPath,'utf8');const updated=src.replace(', \"--include\", \"optional\"','');if(updated!==src){fs.writeFileSync(npmCollectorPath,updated);}}const collectorPath=path.join(__dirname,'node_modules/app-builder-lib/out/node-module-collector/nodeModulesCollector.js');if(fs.existsSync(collectorPath)){const original=fs.readFileSync(collectorPath,'utf8');let src=original.replace('if (!dependencies.path) {','if (!dependencies.path || !fs.existsSync(dependencies.path)) {');const updated=src.replace(/throw new Error\(\"unable to parse[^\"]*reduce\"\);/,'return acc;');if(updated!==original){fs.writeFileSync(collectorPath,updated);}}"
scripts.build:unpack: npm run patch:tailwind-oxide && npm run build && electron-builder --dir
scripts.build:win: npm run patch:tailwind-oxide && npm run build && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:mac: npm run patch:tailwind-oxide && electron-vite build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.build:linux: npm run patch:tailwind-oxide && electron-vite build && electron-builder --linux
